@aselle Could we just convert seq_lens to int32 if its dtype is int64 in tf.sequence_mask implementation?

However since the error occurs due to less operation in gen_math_ops._range(0, maxlen, 1) < expand_dims(lengths, 1) where the left operand is int32 and the right operand is int64. Maybe we could add type promotion mechanisms in these operations.

If it's ok by converting seq_lens to int32 in tf.sequence_mask, I can add it as a patch. Wellcome your advice -:)
